text: Sid Hartman (March 15, 1920 â€“ October 18, 2020) was an American sports journalist for the Minneapolis Star Tribune and the WCCO 830 AM radio station. He was also a 20-year panelist on the weekly Sports Show with Mike Max, which aired Sunday nights at 9:30 p.m. on WUCW 23 in the Twin Cities metro area. Hartman died on October 18, 2020 in Minneapolis at the age of 100. ==References== Category:1920 births Category:2020 deaths Category:American centenarians Category:American journalists Category:Writers from Minneapolis
title: Sid Hartman
